UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure and Activity of a Selective Antibiofilm Peptide SK-24 Derived from the NMR Structure of Human Cathelicidin LL-37.
Literature.Author: Zhang Y, Lakshmaiah Narayana J, Wu Q, Dang X, Wang G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human erythrocytes:25% Hemolysis=200 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium V284-17(MIC=>32µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=>32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae E406-17(MIC=>32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii B28-16(MIC=>32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa E411-17(MIC=>32µM),Escherichia coli E423-17(MIC=>32µM)
